item.description: Welcome to my site! I am a fourth-year PhD student of Operations Research at Columbia University. I’m fortunate to be advised by Prof. Adam Elmachtoub. I’m joining HKU Business School as an assistant professor in the fall. My research spans two major themes: Operations management in emerging digital markets, with a current focus on video games. Promoting responsible operations in profit-driven businesses. In the summer of 2020, I worked as a data scientist intern at Activision Blizzard.
